445990.name: Homefront®: The Revolution - Expansion Pass
445990.description:
The Homefront: The Revolution Expansion Pass gives players access to all three single-player expansions for the game; you'll search for a Resistance cell in The Voice of Freedom; embark on a daring rescue mission in Aftermath; and journey outside of occupied Philadelphia in search of hope in Beyond the Walls.

Alongside this, the pass provides some exclusive bonuses for use in Homefront’s online co-operative experience, Resistance Mode - Supply Line entitles you to a weekly FREE Resistance Crate, while The Right Kind of School unlocks three unique starting careers for your character.
445990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
